::KitKat::

She scowled at Drillbit."Megatron is a good leader.  Some battle just 
don't go as planned. I mean, if every battle was easy, the maximals 
wouldn't be around right now. So don't talk baddly about our leader 
like that. Besides, the only reason I"m even thinking about this is 
to do this FOR Megatron. Got it? A warrior doesn't turn tratior on 
thier leader. No matter how bad it sometimes looks. " She turned and 
faced the others. She smiled,"Now then, first we need to see what it 
is we plan to take over. The ship it's self. We need to know the 
skematics of the ship and all the possable ways to get in and if need 
be, get out. Then we come up with a plan of attack.  First off, we 
need plans of the ship."



-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit:: turned towards land Mine.
> "Of course getting killed is bad. Anyway, KitKat is right. If we 
attack
> the CF without a plan, we'll fare no better then Megatron."
